## Boston Housing example (from `BART` vignette)


```{r boston}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(BART)
library(tidybayes)
library(tidytreatment)

Boston <- MASS::Boston

X <- Boston[, c(6, 13)]
y <- Boston$medv

bart_model <- wbart(x.train = X, 
                  y.train = y, 
                  nskip = 1000, 
                  ndpost = 1000,
                  nkeeptreedraws = 2) # only 2 trees

trees <- get_posterior_trees(bart_model)

trees$trees %>% select(node, parent, label)


```
